## LightModel.sampleNormalMapWithTBN() method

Samples tangent space normal map and then convert it to object space

**Signature:**

```typescript
sampleNormalMapWithTBN(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, tex: PBShaderExp, texCoord: PBShaderExp, normalScale: PBShaderExp, TBN: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |
|  tex | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | Normal map |
|  texCoord | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | Sample texture coordinate |
|  normalScale | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The normal scale |
|  TBN | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The TBN matrix |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

Object space normal
